resp = client.search(
    index="bicycles,other_cycles",
    query={
        "bool": {
            "must": {
                "match": {
                    "description": "dutch"
                }
            },
            "filter": {
                "term": {
                    "cycle_type": "bicycle"
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
